About Us

Legal Minds International is a pioneer law firm based in New Delhi, founded by former Law Officers of GAIL (India) Ltd. with the mission to make legal services more efficient, cost-effective, and time-bound.

Our team of advocates combines decades of experience with in-depth domain knowledge across industries, representing corporates and institutions before the Supreme Court, High Courts, APTEL, CESTAT, NGT, NCLAT, PNGRB, and regulatory bodies such as the Competition Commission of India.

What sets us apart is our unique mix of seasoned expertise and youthful innovation, enabling us to deliver bespoke legal solutions tailored to each client’s needs. Guided by our founding partners, we maintain the highest standards of integrity, strategy, and dedication.

Our Philosophy

At Legal Minds International, we believe that the foundation of trusted relationships lies in shared values, integrity, and a deep understanding of our clients’ needs.

We blend professional expertise with business objectives, ensuring that every solution is practical, strategic, and tailored to the unique challenges of our clients.

Our team represents a rare balance of seasoned experience and youthful energy—a combination that sets us apart and drives us to deliver consistently at the highest standards.

With a commitment to innovation, knowledge, and excellence, our vision is simple: to be a globally recognized law firm delivering clarity in counsel and strength in advocacy.

Areas of Practice

Oil & Natural Gas

Advisory on licensing, pricing, and compliance before MoPNG, DGH, and PNGRB. Drafting Gas Sale, Transmission, and LNG agreements. Representation in arbitrations and disputes before Supreme Court, High Courts, APTEL, and PNGRB.

Energy & Natural Resources

Advisory on the Electricity Act, 2003 and related laws. Drafting Power Purchase Agreements. Representation before SERC, CERC, and APTEL.

Indirect Taxation

Handling disputes under Central Excise, Customs, Sales Tax, and Service Tax before CESTAT and taxation commissioners.

Litigation & Arbitration

Civil suits, writs, NI Act cases, and corporate disputes. High-stakes arbitrations before former judges of High Courts and the Supreme Court, plus matters before NCLT, NCLAT, NGT, and Consumer Forums.

Banking, Finance & Insurance

Restructuring, insolvency, insurance, project finance, and cheque dishonor matters. Representation before DRT, DRAT, IRDAI, Consumer Forums, MACT, and Banking Ombudsman.

Insolvency & Bankruptcy

Proven expertise in proceedings under the IBC, 2017 before NCLT and NCLAT.

Real Estate & Infrastructure

Legal support in purchase, leasing, and compliance under land laws. Advisory on stamp duty, registration, and acquisition. End-to-end contract drafting and negotiation for infrastructure projects.

Labour & Industrial Law

Advisory and compliance under Industrial Disputes Act, Factories Act, Minimum Wages Act, and others. Representation before Labour Courts, Tribunals, and Commissioners.

Research & Training

Conducting workshops and training programs for corporates, supported by a dedicated legal research team to keep clients updated.

About Our Partners

Shri A.V.S. Subramanyam

Advocate & Managing Partner

Shri A.V.S. Subramanyam has over 19 years of experience in the legal field, particularly in the Oil & Gas and Banking sectors. He has handled multifarious litigations, including arbitrations, and previously served as in-house counsel for GAIL (India) Ltd, State Bank of Hyderabad (SBH), and State Bank of Bikaner & Jaipur (SBBJ).

He has extensive expertise in drafting and negotiating agreements in the Oil & Gas sector such as Gas Sale and Purchase Agreements, Gas Transmission Agreements, Shareholder Agreements, Bank Guarantees, Confidentiality Agreements, Non-Disclosure Agreements, Tolling Term Sheets, Definitive Agreements, Secondment Agreements, and Commodity Swapping Agreements.

Shri Subramanyam also has a proven track record in conducting high-value arbitrations in the Oil & Gas sector.

Shri Niraj Kumar

Advocate & Managing Partner

Shri Niraj Kumar brings over 17 years of legal experience, with specialization in the Oil & Gas, Banking, and Finance sectors. He has handled numerous litigations, including arbitrations, and has served as in-house legal counsel for leading corporates such as STFC, Kotak Bank, ICICI Bank, Cholamandalam DBS, and GAIL (India) Ltd.

He has specialized expertise in drafting and finalizing agreements in the Oil & Gas sector including Gas Sale and Purchase Agreements, Gas Transmission Agreements, Shareholder Agreements, Bank Guarantees, Confidentiality Agreements, Non-Disclosure Agreements, Tolling Term Sheets, Definitive Agreements, Secondment Agreements, and Commodity Swapping Agreements.

Shri Niraj Kumar has a proven track record in conducting arbitrations relating to Oil & Gas sector disputes.
